name: Fly VR - Flight Simulator for Google Cardboard
name_original: Fly VR - Flight Simulator for Google Cardboard
description:
Get ready to be thrilled!

Experience fun gameplay and immersive world in this beautiful VR flying game.

◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇

◇ ULTIMATE 3D VR EXPERIENCE ◇
Fly through immersive high quality world, made even more amazing through the power of virtual reality!

◇ EASY TO PLAY, FUN TO MASTER ◇
No controller is needed. Simply tilt and nod your head to look where you want to fly!

◇ ADDICTIVE GAMEPLAY ◇
Avoid obstacles and use exciting power ups on your mission!

◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇◆◇

◆ Works with most VR compatible headsets

◆ Warning: Taking to the sky can be disorienting and exhilarating.
